title: Mobile: Enable live reloading in Capacitor
description: Set up fast dev loop with Capacitor for Android and iOS (hot reload). Provide docs and commands that work reliably.

title: Search: Fix search bar to query across all filters
description: Allow searching across all filter fields and incident attributes. Debounced input, keyboard accessibility, and clear 'no results' state.

title: Approvals: Fix approval queue
description: Ensure incidents pending approval appear in a single queue. Single-vote approval works, proper status transitions, and audit trail.

title: Config: Centralize database selection in a single env variable
description: Introduce one environment variable to select database target (local/Atlas/etc.). Update services to read only this source and document usage.

title: Notifications: Implement push and in-app notifications
description: Notification service for chat messages, approvals, and panic events. Respect permissions and user settings.

title: Permissions: Define and enforce permissions config
description: Role-based access (admin/editor/user). Guard API routes and UI actions; add tests for critical paths.

title: Auth: Fix logout bug
description: Investigate logout not clearing session fully. Ensure tokens/cookies are cleared and user is redirected correctly.

title: Android: Production support
description: Resolve remaining Android issues (permissions, navigation, build). Deliver signed build and checklist for Play Store readiness.

title: iOS: Production support
description: Resolve iOS-specific issues (permissions, deep links). Deliver signed build and checklist for App Store readiness.

title: BLE Panic: Onboarding flow
description: Create onboarding to pair a BLE panic button. Handle permissions, pairing, reconnection, and error states.

title: Chat: Reply to message
description: Support quoted replies or threaded messages in chat UI and storage.

title: Chat: Show chat members
description: List participants with online status and role badges.

title: Chat: Anonymous messaging option
description: Allow optional anonymous messages in neighborhood chat with moderation and abuse controls.

title: Panic: Software panic button toggle
description: Show a toggle to enable/disable the software panic button. If location permission is off, explain the disabled state and guide to enable.

title: Profile: Public/Private setting
description: Add privacy setting to switch between public and private profile; update visibility rules accordingly.

title: Android: Fix back navigation exits the app
description: Handle Android back button to navigate within the app; only exit on root with confirmation.

title: Filters: Improve UX
description: Refine filters layout and interactions: clearer multi-select, 'clear all', and persistence across navigation.

title: Incidents: Tags UI/UX
description: Redesign tags picker, consistent colors, keyboard navigation, and accessibility.

title: Design: Set a global color palette
description: Define design tokens and Tailwind theme. Align map overlays and UI colors for consistency.

title: Design: Dark and light mode
description: Implement theme switcher, persist preference, and ensure contrast accessibility.

title: UI: Fix incident list modal floating bug
description: Fix modal position/z-index and scroll locking to avoid floating glitches.

title: Map: Improve colors
description: Adjust map marker/overlay colors for better contrast and severity scale readability.

title: Filters: Fix neighborhoods data
description: Correct neighborhood names and mapping; ensure search and filtering work across all datasets.
